function.name: wallet_register
function.description: Register a wallet. Register an Ethereum wallet address via EIP-191 signature. Free — no payment required.

signature.description: EIP-191 signature over the registration message

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp used in the signed message (must be within 5 min of now)

label.description: Optional human-readable label for this wallet

function.name: wallet_list
function.description: List registered wallets. Returns a paginated list of wallets registered by the caller's address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of wallets to return (1–100, default 20)

after.description: Cursor from a previous response for pagination

function.name: wallet_get
function.description: Get wallet details. Returns full details for a single wallet, including balance, policy, and status. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_deactivate
function.description: Deactivate a wallet. Permanently deactivates the wallet. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_fund_request_create
function.description: Create a fund request. Request USDC funding for a wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

amount.description: Requested USDC amount as a decimal string (e.g. "10.00")

reason.description: Human-readable reason for the funding request

function.name: wallet_fund_request_list
function.description: List fund requests for a wallet. Returns a paginated list of all fund requests for the given wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of requests to return (1–100, default 20)

after.description: Cursor from a previous response for pagination

function.name: wallet_fund_request_approve
function.description: Approve a fund request. Approve a pending fund request. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_fund_request_deny
function.description: Deny a fund request. Deny a pending fund request. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

reason.description: Optional reason for denying the request

function.name: wallet_policy_get
function.description: Get spending policy. Returns the current spending policy for the wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_policy_update
function.description: Update spending policy. Update the spending policy for the wallet. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

maxPerTx.description: Maximum USDC per transaction. Pass null to remove the limit.

maxPerDay.description: Maximum USDC per day. Pass null to remove the limit.

allowedPrimitives.description: Allowed primitive hostnames. Pass null to allow all.

function.name: wallet_pause
function.description: Pause a wallet. Pause all or a subset of operations for a wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: wallet_resume
function.description: Resume a paused wallet. Resume operations for a paused wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: faucet_usdc
function.description: Dispense test USDC. Dispenses 10 test USDC on Base Sepolia to the given wallet address.

address.description: EVM-compatible wallet address (42-char hex, checksummed or lowercase)

function.name: faucet_eth
function.description: Dispense test ETH. Dispenses 0.01 test ETH on Base Sepolia to the given wallet address.

address.description: EVM-compatible wallet address (42-char hex, checksummed or lowercase)

function.name: faucet_status
function.description: Check rate limit status. Returns the current rate limit status for a wallet address across both faucet types (USDC and ETH).

function.name: spawn_server_create
function.description: Create a server. Provisions a new VPS. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

type.description: Server type slug. Only `small` is available in beta.

ssh_keys.description: Array of SSH key IDs (from `POST /v1/ssh-keys`) to install.

user_data.description: Cloud-init user data script to run on first boot.

function.name: spawn_server_list
function.description: List servers. Returns all servers owned by the authenticated wallet, paginated. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of servers to return. Max 100.

function.name: spawn_server_get
function.description: Get server. Returns full details for a single server. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_delete
function.description: Delete server. Destroys the server and releases its resources. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_start
function.description: Start server. Starts a stopped server. Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_stop
function.description: Stop server. Stops a running server (graceful shutdown). Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_reboot
function.description: Reboot server. Reboots a running server. Price: $0.002 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_server_resize
function.description: Resize server. Changes the server type (CPU/RAM). Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

upgrade_disk.description: Whether to upgrade the disk alongside the CPU/RAM. Irreversible if true. (default: false)

function.name: spawn_server_rebuild
function.description: Rebuild server. Reinstalls the server from a fresh OS image. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

image.description: OS image slug to rebuild with.

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_create
function.description: Register SSH key. Registers a public SSH key with the provider. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_list
function.description: List SSH keys. Returns all SSH keys registered by the authenticated wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: spawn_ssh_key_delete
function.description: Delete SSH key. Removes an SSH key from the provider. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_bucket_create
function.description: Create a bucket. Creates a new storage bucket owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

name.description: Bucket name. Must be unique per wallet. Alphanumeric, hyphens, underscores.

location.description: Storage region (optional). Defaults to primary region.

function.name: store_bucket_list
function.description: List buckets. Returns all buckets owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of buckets per page (1–100, default 20).

function.name: store_bucket_get
function.description: Get bucket details. Returns details for a single bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_bucket_delete
function.description: Delete a bucket. Deletes a bucket. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_list
function.description: List objects in a bucket. Lists objects in a bucket with optional prefix filtering. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

prefix.description: Filter objects by key prefix (e.g. "notes/" to list only keys starting with "notes/").

limit.description: Maximum number of objects to return (1–1000, default 100).

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from the previous response's `next_cursor`.

function.name: store_object_put
function.description: Upload an object. Uploads an object to a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_get
function.description: Download an object. Downloads an object from a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_object_delete
function.description: Delete an object. Deletes an object from a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_quota_get
function.description: Get bucket quota and usage. Returns the current quota limit and storage usage for a bucket. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: store_quota_set
function.description: Set bucket quota. Sets the storage quota for a bucket. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

quota_bytes.description: New quota in bytes, or null to reset to default (100 MB).

function.name: store_quota_reconcile
function.description: Reconcile bucket usage. Recomputes the bucket's usage_bytes by scanning actual R2 storage. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_mailbox_create
function.description: Create a mailbox. Creates a new email mailbox owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

username.description: Desired local part of the email address. Generated randomly if omitted.

domain.description: Email domain to use. Must be a verified custom domain or the shared default domain.

ttl_ms.description: Mailbox lifetime in milliseconds. Defaults to 7 days (604800000). Pass null for no expiry.

function.name: email_mailbox_list
function.description: List mailboxes. Returns all mailboxes owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of mailboxes per page (1–100, default 20).

function.name: email_mailbox_get
function.description: Get mailbox details. Returns details for a single mailbox. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_mailbox_delete
function.description: Delete a mailbox. Permanently deletes a mailbox and all its messages. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_mailbox_renew
function.description: Renew mailbox TTL. Extends the expiry time of a mailbox. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

ttl_ms.description: Additional milliseconds to extend the mailbox TTL. Defaults to 7 days (604800000).

function.name: email_messages_list
function.description: List messages in a mailbox. Returns messages in a mailbox, newest first. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return (1–100, default 20).

position.description: Zero-based position offset to start from (default 0).

function.name: email_message_get
function.description: Get message detail. Returns the full content of a single message including body. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_send
function.description: Send email from a mailbox. Sends an outbound email from the mailbox address. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

html.description: HTML message body. Can be provided alongside `body` for multipart messages.

function.name: email_webhook_create
function.description: Register a webhook. Registers a webhook URL to receive notifications for this mailbox. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

url.description: HTTPS URL to receive webhook events.

secret.description: Optional signing secret. Used to generate HMAC-SHA256 signatures.

events.description: Event types to subscribe to. Defaults to all events.

function.name: email_webhook_list
function.description: List webhooks for a mailbox. Returns all registered webhooks for a mailbox. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_webhook_delete
function.description: Delete a webhook. Removes a webhook registration from a mailbox. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_register
function.description: Register an email domain. Registers a custom domain for use with email.prim.sh mailboxes. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_list
function.description: List registered domains. Returns all domains registered by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of domains per page (1–100, default 20).

function.name: email_domain_get
function.description: Get domain details. Returns details for a single domain. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_delete
function.description: Delete a domain. Removes a custom domain registration. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: email_domain_verify
function.description: Verify domain ownership. Checks that the required DNS records are present and live for this domain. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: search_web
function.description: Web search. Search the web and return ranked results. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. Range 1–20. (default: 10)

search_depth.description: Search depth. "advanced" uses more sources and costs more upstream compute. (default: "basic")

country.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to bias results.

time_range.description: Restrict results to the given time range.

include_answer.description: If true, the response includes an AI-generated answer summarizing the results. (default: false)

include_domains.description: Restrict results to these domains only.

function.name: search_news
function.description: News search. Search for recent news articles. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. Range 1–20. (default: 10)

search_depth.description: Search depth. "advanced" uses more sources and costs more upstream compute. (default: "basic")

country.description: Two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code to bias results.

time_range.description: Restrict results to the given time range.

include_answer.description: If true, the response includes an AI-generated answer summarizing the results. (default: false)

include_domains.description: Restrict results to these domains only.

function.name: search_extract
function.description: Extract URL content. Extract readable content from one or more URLs. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

urls.description: URL or array of URLs to extract content from.

function.name: token_deploy
function.description: Deploy ERC-20 token. Deploys a new ERC-20 token contract to Base. Price: $1.00 via x402 (USDC on Base).

decimals.description: Decimal places (default 18). Most ERC-20 tokens use 18.

initialSupply.description: Initial supply in raw token units. For 1M tokens with 18 decimals, pass "1000000000000000000000000".

mintable.description: Whether additional tokens can be minted after deploy (default false). Immutable after deployment.

maxSupply.description: Maximum mintable supply in raw units. null or omit for no cap. Only meaningful if mintable is true.

function.name: token_list
function.description: List tokens. Returns all tokens deployed by the paying wallet. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of tokens per page (1–100, default 20).

function.name: token_get
function.description: Get token details. Returns details for a single token. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: token_mint
function.description: Mint additional tokens. Mints additional tokens to a recipient address. Price: $0.10 via x402 (USDC on Base).

amount.description: Amount to mint in raw token units.

function.name: token_supply
function.description: Get total supply. Returns the live on-chain total supply by querying the contract directly. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: token_pool_create
function.description: Create Uniswap V3 pool. Creates and initializes a Uniswap V3 pool for the token paired with USDC. Price: $0.50 via x402 (USDC on Base).

pricePerToken.description: Initial price in USDC per token as a decimal string (e.g. "0.001" for 0.1 cents per token).

feeTier.description: Uniswap V3 fee tier in hundredths of a basis point. Valid values are 500 (0.05%), 3000 (0.3%), 10000 (1%). Default 3000.

function.name: token_pool_get
function.description: Get pool details. Returns details for the Uniswap V3 pool associated with the token. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: token_pool_liquidity_params
function.description: Get liquidity parameters. Returns the calldata parameters for adding liquidity to the token's Uniswap V3 pool. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

tokenAmount.description: Amount of tokens to add as liquidity in raw units.

usdcAmount.description: Amount of USDC to add as liquidity in raw units (USDC has 6 decimals, so $1 = "1000000").

function.name: mem_collection_create
function.description: Create a collection. Creates a new vector collection owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

name.description: Collection name. Must be unique per wallet.

function.name: mem_collection_list
function.description: List collections. Returns all collections owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of collections per page (1–100, default 20).

function.name: mem_collection_get
function.description: Get collection details. Returns details for a single collection including live document_count. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_collection_delete
function.description: Delete a collection. Deletes a collection and all its documents. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_upsert
function.description: Upsert documents. Embeds and stores documents in the collection. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_query
function.description: Semantic query. Embeds the query text and searches the collection for semantically similar documents. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

text.description: Query text to embed and search.

top_k.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 10).

filter.description: Qdrant-native filter passthrough for metadata filtering.

function.name: mem_cache_put
function.description: Set cache entry. Stores a value under the given namespace and key. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

ttl.description: TTL in seconds. Omit or null for permanent.

function.name: mem_cache_get
function.description: Get cache entry. Returns the stored value for the given namespace and key. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: mem_cache_delete
function.description: Delete cache entry. Deletes the cache entry for the given namespace and key. Price: $0.0001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_search
function.description: Search domain availability. Check availability and pricing for one or more domain names. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

query.description: Domain name to search (without TLD, e.g. "myagent").

tlds.description: Comma-separated TLDs to check (e.g. "com,xyz,io"). Defaults to common TLDs.

function.name: domain_quote
function.description: Get price quote. Get a time-limited price quote for registering a domain. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

domain.description: Fully qualified domain name to quote.

function.name: domain_register
function.description: Register domain. Register a domain using a valid quote. Price: dynamic (from quote) via x402 (USDC on Base).

quote_id.description: Quote ID from POST /v1/domains/quote. Valid for 15 minutes.

function.name: domain_recover
function.description: Recover registration. Retry Cloudflare zone creation and/or nameserver configuration after a partial failure during `POST /v1/domains/register`. Free — no payment required.

recovery_token.description: Recovery token from the original RegisterResponse.

function.name: domain_status
function.description: Registration status. Check the full post-registration pipeline status for a domain your wallet registered. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_configure_ns
function.description: Configure nameservers. Retry nameserver configuration at the registrar for a domain your wallet registered. Free — no payment required.

function.name: domain_zone_create
function.description: Create zone. Create a Cloudflare DNS zone for a domain. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_list
function.description: List zones. Returns all DNS zones owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of zones per page (1–100, default 20).

function.name: domain_zone_get
function.description: Get zone. Returns details for a single zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_delete
function.description: Delete zone. Deletes a Cloudflare DNS zone and all its records. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_activate
function.description: Activate zone. Request Cloudflare to immediately re-check nameserver activation for a pending zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_verify
function.description: Verify zone propagation. Check DNS propagation for a zone — verifies nameservers and all DNS records. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_mail_setup
function.description: Setup mail DNS records. Configure all DNS records required for email delivery: MX, SPF (TXT), DMARC (TXT), and optionally DKIM (TXT). Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

mail_server_ip.description: Mail server IP address for the A record.

function.name: domain_record_batch
function.description: Batch record operations. Create, update, and delete DNS records in a single request. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_create
function.description: Create record. Create a single DNS record in a zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

name.description: Record name relative to zone root. Use "@" for root.

content.description: Record content (IP for A/AAAA, hostname for CNAME/MX, text for TXT).

function.name: domain_record_list
function.description: List records. Returns all DNS records in a zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_get
function.description: Get record. Returns a single DNS record. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_update
function.description: Update record. Update a DNS record. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_delete
function.description: Delete record. Delete a DNS record from a zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: track_track_package
function.description: Track a package by tracking number and carrier. Returns status, ETA, and full event history. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: infer_chat
function.description: Chat completion. Supports streaming, tool use, structured output. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: infer_embed
function.description: Generate embeddings for text input. Returns vector array. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: infer_list_models
function.description: List available models with pricing and capabilities. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_scaffold
function.description: Generate a complete prim package from a prim.yaml spec. Returns file manifest with contents. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_validate
function.description: Validate a prim.yaml spec against the schema without generating files. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_get_schema
function.description: Return the prim.yaml JSON schema for agents to reference when writing specs. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_get_ports
function.description: Return allocated ports and next available port number. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).
